channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 4 + 5 April 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the computer-based Cambridge assessment B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 4 + 5 April 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 4 + 5 April 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the computer-based Cambridge assessment B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 4 + 5 April 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the English language development course for the B1 Preliminary exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B1 Preliminary (PET) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in March-April at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty of Law: student reception on February 2, 2024
item.description: On Friday, 2 February 2024 the student reception for Law and Science of Legal Services programmes will be available remotely via Microsoft Teams (by using the ID number 327 648 988 991) or by calling the phone number 02-50312473, from 9:30 to 12 noon.%0A

item.title: Provisional ranking for International mobility contributions academic year 2022/2023

item.title: Applications for academic year 2024/2025
item.description: Applications to open-admission Master‚Äôs degree programmes for the academic year 2024/2025 are open from 22 January 2024.%0ANon-EU students VISA applicants can generally apply until 31 March 2024.%0AFor information, please visit the webpage Open admission master programmes.%0A %0A

item.title: Call for CELI exams - A2, B1 and B2 levels on 13-14 March 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams scheduled on 13-14 March 2024.%0APLEASE NOTE: seats for the CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams are sold out.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 8 March 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 8 March 2024.%0APLEASE NOTE: differently from what is written in the call, results for this session may be available 2-3 weeks from the end of the key assessment date.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details
